name: Community Phone Company
headline: Modern landline and voice services
description:
Community Phone Company YC W19 built a simple cloud phone system that runs inside of landlines

Our solution lets a business or family get all modern voice features (re-route if busy, greeting menu and IVR, programmable caller ID, cloud voicemail, etc) on their existing desk phone and existing cell phones. All employees onboard instantly, no wifi required, no app to download.

# Simple Phone Service for Your Home or Business
Great reliability and call quality starting at $39.99/month.
See All Plan Options
Or call our specialists at
[866-969-4886](https://www.communityphone.org/<tel:+18669694886>)
![USA Today](https://www.communityphone.org/_next/static/media/usa-today.f1cadcfe.svg)![The Boston Globe](https://www.communityphone.org/_next/static/media/the-boston-globe.b7f7cb99.svg)![NPR](https://www.communityphone.org/_next/static/media/npr.6949e414.svg)
## Why Community Phone?
We believe your phone service should be simple, affordable, and there whenever you need it. No hidden fees, no complicated setups—just a reliable service for your local community.
See All Plan Options
Or call our specialists at
[866-969-4886](https://www.communityphone.org/<tel:+18669694886>)
No Internet Required
The home phone base doesn’t use the internet to work, and a backup battery keeps you connected for up to 12 hours without power.
No Hidden Fees
We don’t tie you up in long contracts or nickel & dime you with hidden fees. Our phone plans are simple and straightforward.
Guaranteed Call Quality
When we confirm you’ll have strong call quality at your address, we stand behind it. And if you find you don’t have reliable coverage, we’ll provide a full refund.
3-Year Price Lock
We give our customers peace of mind with a 3-year price lock so you know that our prices won’t mysteriously go up the moment you become a member.
Real Human Support
Technology and AI bots are cool, but we make sure to invest in a real human team to support you whenever you have questions and concerns.
See All Plan Options
Or call our specialists at
[866-969-4886](https://www.communityphone.org/<tel:+18669694886>)
# Finally, a reliable landline alternative.
  * Strong signal
  * No internet required
  * Battery backup


The Community Phone base is a modern replacement for traditional landlines, using industrial-grade antennas to connect to nearby cell towers for reliable service. Simply connect the base to the phone. It works with no internet connection needed. Plus the built-in backup battery keeps your service running during power outages.
![Finally, a reliable landline alternative.](https://www.communityphone.org/img/blog/images/astound-alternative-4.webp)
# Features that make your life easier.
**Spam call blocking:** Stop dangerous scammers and annoying telemarketers from calling your phone. **Cell-phone call forwarding:** Forward office or home phone calls to your cell phone and stay connected anywhere - easily managed through our mobile app. **Voicemail transcription:** Read your voicemail transcriptions anytime - available in our mobile app or delivered to your email. **SMS features (great for businesses!):** Text from your main line, set up automatic replies, and share booking links for easy scheduling-all in one.
**Memorable numbers (great for anyone!):** Choose a memorable number for your home or business - like turning 800-FLOWERS or 954-BARBARA into your own custom number.
![Features that make your life easier.](https://www.communityphone.org/img/blog/images/b2b-image.png)
Switch Today & Get 1 Month Free
Check to see if we provide coverage in your area.
[See All Plan Options](https://www.communityphone.org/<https:/checkout.communityphone.org/coverage/check>)
Want to chat with us quickly instead?
Talk with one of our experts 7 days a week.
[866-969-4886](https://www.communityphone.org/<tel:+18669694886>)
![Community Phone](https://www.communityphone.org/_next/static/media/logo-blue.e6cfd191.svg)
Your communication is a gift to us. Thank you for the opportunity to help with something so precious.
Download CommunityPhone+
Supercharge your business phone with our app. Book customers more quickly and ensure they keep coming back using advanced features like SMS auto-reply and appointment reminders.
[![Apple App Store Logo](https://www.communityphone.org/_next/static/media/app-store-icon.deb6e463.svg)](https://www.communityphone.org/<https:/apps.apple.com/app/id6444163835?utm_source=mobile-app&utm_medium=mobile-app-lander&ct=website-banner>)[![Google Play Store Logo](https://www.communityphone.org/_next/static/media/googleplay-icon.91129b22.svg)](https://www.communityphone.org/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.communityphone.app.customer>)

generated_description:
### Community Phone Company: A Simple Revolution in Voice Services 

**Overview**

Founded in 2018 as part of the Y Combinator W19 batch, Community Phone Company is transforming the telecommunications landscape by providing modern landline and voice services that do away with the complexities of traditional setup. Based in Boston, they’ve gathered a team of around 70 passionate individuals, guided by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell.

**Mission**

At its core, Community Phone aims to modernize voice services for both families and businesses. They’ve built a user-friendly cloud phone system that makes it easy to utilize modern features through existing desk and mobile phones—all without needing Wi-Fi or cumbersome app downloads.

**What They Do**

Community Phone makes voice services accessible: 
- With features like call forwarding, cloud voicemail, spam blocking, and even voicemail transcription, they save users from the frustrations often tied to conventional phone systems.
- The service operates on a secure landline-like base that connects to local cell towers rather than the internet, ensuring reliability even during power outages.

**Key Features**
1. **Internet-Free Operation:** Their home phone base works independently, using a robust infrastructure to maintain service quality.
2. **Transparent Pricing:** Customers enjoy straightforward pricing without hidden fees. Plus, there’s a three-year price lock, giving users peace of mind that costs won’t unexpectedly climb.
3. **Human Support:** Community Phone emphasizes real human interaction, ensuring customers can get help whenever they need it instead of dealing with automated systems.

**Service Offerings**

They cater to a wide spectrum of customer needs:
- **Home Phone Service:** Reliable landline alternatives for personal use.
- **Business Phone Service:** Tailored solutions that come with business-specific features like SMS capabilities and customized voicemail.
- **Accessibility Solutions:** Special offerings cater to seniors and caretakers, ensuring everyone can stay connected conveniently.

**Pricing**

Plans start at an affordable $39.99/month, making it attractive for individuals and businesses alike.

**Final Thoughts**

Community Phone Company is more than just a telecommunications provider; they are advocates for simplifying communication. Their approachable model ensures that both homes and businesses can harness the power of modern voice capabilities without unnecessary complexity. If you're looking for a reliable way to stay connected, Community Phone could be the answer.

You can learn more by visiting their website at [communityphone.org](https://www.communityphone.org).
